snippet.title: Hop Off - Teaser Trailer | PC
snippet.description:
You are Cenoura - the Experiment 626, trapped in a research laboratory. Your one and only objective is to escape from the hands of the scientists and guards.
From a third-person perspective,  escape from the research laboratory by solving puzzles and remaining stealth.

If you like the game, please check out our itch.io page and download it for free! https://pau1o-hs.itch.io/hop-off





Hop Off is a third-person, stealth and puzzle game developed in 4 months by me and my fellow university colleagues.

CREDITS
Leader/Programmer: Paulo da Silva
Level Design: Gustavo Mastrobuono
Sound Effects: Witor de Oliveira
UI Images: Bruno del Monde
Soundtrack: Daniel da Silva
